TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi sealed beforefieldinit TableRowCollection extends System.Object implements class System.Collections.ICollection, class System.Collections.IEnumerable, class System.Collections.IList
Public NotInheritable Class TableRowCollection Implements IList
public ref class TableRowCollection sealed : System::Collections::IList
type TableRowCollection = class interface IList interface ICollection interface IEnumerable

summary.span: 封装表示 控件中单个行的 对象集合。

span.span: Encapsulates a collection of objects that represent a single row in a control.

summary.span: 此类不能被继承。

span.span: This class cannot be inherited.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用此类以编程方式管理对象的集合 。Use this class to programmatically manage a collection of objects. 此类通常用于在控件中添加或删除行 。This class is commonly used to add or remove rows from a control. > [!NOTE] > 控件包含一个 集合，该集合表示对象的集合 。A control contains a collection that represents a collection of objects. 每个都 表示表中的单个行并包含一个 表示对象集合的集合 。Each represents an individual row in the table and contains a collection that represents a collection of objects. 这些 对象表示表中的单个单元格。These objects represent the individual cells in the table. 若要获取单个单元格，你必须首先 从控件的 集合中获取 。To get an individual cell, you must first get a from the collection of a control. 然后，可以从的 集合中获取 。You can then get a from the collection of the . ## Examples 下面的示例演示如何通过将 表示表行的对象通过属性添加到控件，以编程方式向表中添加行 。The following example demonstrates how to programmatically add rows to a table by adding objects, which represent the rows of the table, to the control through the property. [!code-aspx-csharp[Classic TableRowCollection Example#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/Classic TableRowCollection Example/CS/sourcecs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[Classic TableRowCollection Example#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/Classic TableRowCollection Example/VB/sourcevb.aspx#1)] [!code-xml[Classic TableRowCollection Example#1](~/samples/snippets/common/VS_Snippets_WebNet/Classic TableRowCollection Example/Common/source.xml#1)]

summary.span: 将 对象从指定的数组追加到集合的末尾。

span.span: Appends the objects from the specified array to the end of the collection.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用 方法可将 指定数组中的对象追加到集合中。Use the method to append the objects from the specified array to the collection. 构造表时，通常使用此方法。This method is commonly used when you are constructing a table. 若要构造表，请先创建一个 对象数组来表示表中的行。To construct a table, first create an array of objects to represent the rows of the table. 接下来，使用 方法，将数组作为参数传递，将 对象添加到集合中。Next, use the method, passing the array as an argument, to add the objects to the collection.

summary.span: 返回一个实现了 的对象，该对象包含 内的所有 对象。

span.span: Returns a implemented object that contains all objects within the .

returns.span: 一个实现了 的对象，该对象包含 内的所有 对象。

span.span: A implemented object that contains all objects within the .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用此方法创建一个已 实现的对象，该对象可循环访问以获取中的每一项 。Use this method to create a implemented object that can be iterated through easily to get each item in the . 使用 属性可获取集合中当前指向的项。Use the property to get the item currently pointed to in the collection. 使用 方法移动到集合中的下一项。Use the method to move to the next item in the collection. 使用 方法可将枚举数移回初始位置。Use the method to move the enumerator back to the initial position. > [!NOTE] > 在 创建已 实现的对象或使用 方法将枚举器移动到集合中的第一项后，必须调用方法。The method must be called after creating a implemented object or using the method to move the enumerator to the first item in the collection. 否则，由属性表示的项 是不确定的。Otherwise, the item represented by the property is undefined. ## Examples 下面的示例演示如何使用 方法创建一个 已实现的对象，该对象将循环访问以显示表中的项。The following example demonstrates how to use the method to create a implemented object that is iterated through to display the items in the table.
